resources.string:
At the beginning the player has to press the "Start Game"-Button. Then you have to follow the following steps:
 
	1) The first player (Host) has to create a Lobby with the "Create Lobby"-Button. 
	2) The Host shares the GameID via the Send Link-Button. 
	3) The other players then have to join via the "Join Lobby" Button 
	4) There they have to enter the GameID. 
	5) After all the player are assembled the Host can start the Game. 
	6) Everybody chooses then their character. 
	7) Now the game begins to find the murderer.

Here you can find all explanations for the tools you need to play the game.
 
The Dice: 
At the beginning of every round a window will pop up asking you to roll the dice. To accomplish that you have two options:
 
	1) Click the dice. 
	2) Shake your phone. 

Now you are able to move your character through the 9 rooms to find clues. The max. number of the steps per roll is 3 or you roll the magnifying glass which will give the information which player a certain card has. 

Move: 
After the dice throw you can use the yellow arrows to move your character. 

The Swiping Motions: 
To make it easier to overview everything you can use three swiping motions to see your cards, notepad and accusation.
 
Swipe Right: There you can see your notepad. Swipe left to get back to the board. 
Swipe Left: To make your suspicion and accusation. Swipe right to get back to the board. 
Swipe Up or down: Open your three cards. 

Notepad: 
In the Notepad you can use Checkboxes to remember your clues for the murderer and accusation. 

Suspicion/Accusation: 
After the left swipe you are in the accusation menu. Here you can select the weapon, the culprit and the room which is automatically your current room. Then you can press the Suspicion or the Accusation Button. If you make an successfully accusation you win the game otherwise you will lose and cannot continue the game.
